field.label: Local stats TCP port
field.help: Choose a TCP port to be used for the local statistics page. The default value is 8822.

field.label: Enable remote access
field.help: Enable remote access to HAProxy's statistics page. This may be a security risk if you do not enable authentication! Note that you need to add appropiate firewall rules for this to work.

field.label: Remote listen addresses
field.help: Configure listen addresses for the statistics page to enable remote access, i.e. 10.0.0.1:8080 or haproxy.example.com:8999. Use TAB key to complete typing a listen address.
field.hint: Enter address:port here. Finish with TAB.

field.label: Allowed Users
field.hint: Type username or choose from list.

field.label: Allowed Groups
field.hint: Type group or choose from list.

field.label: Custom options
field.help:
These lines will be added to the statistics settings of to the HAProxy configuration file.
NOTE: The syntax will not be checked, use at your own risk!

field.label: Listen addresses
field.help: Configure listen addresses for the prometheus exporter, i.e. 10.0.0.1:8404 or haproxy.example.com:8404. Use TAB key to complete typing a listen address.
field.hint: Enter address:port here. Finish with TAB.

field.label: Path
field.help: The path where the Prometheus exporter can be accessed.
